column4: cat /proc/meminfo says I have MemTotal:        3310292 kB.  How come it doesn't say 4gig like act have
I thinks so but bios says I have 4 sticks of 1024
those kind of nuances i've just gave up on solving over the years.  i rember freakin out about a 20 gig hd that showed up as a 18.5 gig ....
